content.p:
Factor the following quadratic polynomial into the form ( x+a )( x+b ) for some integers a and b.
{{poly1}}

Factor the following quadratic polynomial into the form (ax+b)(cx+d) for some integers a,b,c, and d.
{{poly2}}

outtro.p: \left( {{factor21}} \right)\left( {{factor22}} \right) Warning: Your answer might be correct but differ slightly from the displayed answer. If this is the case, make sure that you can explain why your answer is equivalent to the displayed one.
